Question
========

Suppose that the number of games soccer players participate in during their careers is normally distributed with a mean of 1500 games and a standard deviation of 350. Then what is the percentage of players who played more than 2,000 games?

Answerlist
----------

* 7,7%
* 25%
* 75%
* 92,4%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 7,7%: Correct
* 25%: Incorrect
* 75%: Incorrect
* 92,4%: Incorrect
